Bash("$PYTHON" -c "
import py_compile, sys
files = [
    ''NameGenerationAgent/src/api/adapters/base_adapter.py'',
    ''NameGenerationAgent/src/api/adapters/openai_adapter.py'',
    ''NameGenerationAgent/src/api/adapters/gemini_adapter.py'',
    ''NameGenerationAgent/src/api/adapters/aliyun_adapter.py'',
    ''NameGenerationAgent/src/api/adapters/siliconflow_adapter.py'',
    ''NameGenerationAgent/src/data/corpus_loader.py'',
    ''NameGenerationAgent/src/web/app.py'',
]
ok = True
for f in files:
    try:
        py_compile.compile\(f, doraise=True\)
        print\(f''OK: {f}''\)
    except py_compile.PyCompileError as e:
        print\(f''FAIL: {f} - {e}''\)
        ok = False
sys.exit\(0 if ok else 1\)
")

import sys, io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)
sys.stderr = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stderr.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)
import os, sys, json
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)
from config.api_config import PaiouConfig
cfg = PaiouConfig\(\)
print\(''Paiou base_url:'', cfg.base_url\)
print\(''Paiou enabled:'', cfg.enabled\)
if cfg.enabled:
    import requests
    resp = requests.get\(f''{cfg.base_url}/models'', headers=cfg.get_headers\(\), timeout=10\)
    data = resp.json\(\)
    models = data.get\(''data'', []\)
    print\(f''Found {len\(models\)} models''\)
    for m in models[:10]:
        print\(f''  {m.get\(""id""\)}: {m.get\(""object"", """"\)}''\)
    if len\(models\) > 10:
        print\(f''  ... and {len\(models\) - 10} more''\)
")

Bash("C:/Users/胥潘华/Desktop/名字生成智能体/.venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import sys, io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)
sys.stderr = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stderr.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)
import os, json, requests
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)
from config.api_config import AliyunConfig
cfg = AliyunConfig\(\)
print\(''Aliyun base_url:'', cfg.base_url\)
print\(''Aliyun enabled:'', cfg.enabled\)
if cfg.enabled:
    # DashScope models endpoint
    resp = requests.get\(f''{cfg.base_url}/models'', headers=cfg.get_headers\(\), timeout=10\)
    print\(f''Status: {resp.status_code}''\)
    if resp.status_code == 200:
        data = resp.json\(\)
        models = data.get\(''data'', []\)
        print\(f''Found {len\(models\)} models''\)
        for m in models[:10]:
            print\(f''  {m.get\(""id""\)}: {m.get\(""object"", """"\)}''\)
    else:
        print\(f''Response: {resp.text[:500]}''\)
")
